snippet.title: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers: Nintendo Switch Edition - Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
GO ON PATROL. ANYTIME. ANYWHERE. 

Police Simulator: Patrol Officers is finally coming to Nintendo Switch on October 29, 2024!

Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the game, you will soon be able to patrol the streets of the fictional city of Brighton and maintain law and order from anywhere - alone or with a friend! 

Before the start of your first shift in Police Simulator: Patrol Officers: Nintendo Switch™ Edition, you can choose one of eight different characters. Numerous challenging tasks await you in the fictional US city of Brighton, increasing in difficulty and complexity as you climb the career ladder: As a rookie, you start by handing out parking tickets while on foot patrol, but you will soon be given your first patrol car to chase speeding road users, clear up accidents, and investigate suspects. As an experienced police officer, you eventually apprehend pickpockets, deal with drug trafficking, and even investigate major crime scenes. New interactions, vehicles and precincts are continuously unlocked throughout the game, making each shift feel unique. A special game mechanic evaluates your behavior and rewards you by unlocking new content, while misbehavior can quickly lead to dismissal. In addition to playing solo, Police Simulator: Patrol Officers: Nintendo Switch™ Edition offers the opportunity to go on patrol in online co-op mode with a friend. 

Police Simulator: Patrol Officers: Nintendo Switch Edition is now available for pre-order and will be released on October 29, 2024! 👋

👮  Pre-order the game now: https://wonderl.ink/@policesimulator_nsw

The Police Simulator: Patrol Officers Nintendo Switch™ Edition will be available from October 29 in the Nintendo eShop at a price of 29.99 EUR / 29.99 USD (SRP) or the regional equivalent. Players who pre-order the edition will receive a 10% pre-order discount and the Interstate Police Vehicle DLC for free. The Police Simulator: Patrol Officers Nintendo Switch™ Extended Edition will also be released on October 29 in the Nintendo eShop and as a retail version in selected countries at a price of 34.99 EUR / 34.99 USD (SRP) or the regional equivalent. It contains the main game and the Garage Bundle with 6 additional vehicles. Pre-orders in the Nintendo eShop will receive a 10% pre-order discount and the Interstate Police Vehicle DLC for free. In the retail version, the Interstate Police Vehicle DLC is permanently included. 

➡️ Subscribe to our channel to stay up-to-date: https://www.youtube.com/astragon?sub_confirmation=1

#PoliceSimulator #nintendoswitch #SimulationGames

Follow us to not miss anything:
💻 Homepage: https://patrol-officers.com
👍 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PoliceSimulator
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/PolSimulator
📷 https://www.instagram.com/astragon_entertainment/
💬 Discord: https://discord.gg/astragon

👮  What you can expect from Police Simulator: Patrol Officers: Nintendo Switch Edition 👮 

Grab your Nintendo Switch™ and experience the everyday life of a police officer by joining the ranks of this fictitious American city's police force. Begin with parking violations and work your way up to shouldering greater responsibilities. Be part of Brighton's community, get to know your neighborhood, and fulfill the daily duties of a police officer as you fight crime during your shift. Always be tough, but fair: respect the law and gain more experience to unlock more neighborhoods, districts, and duties! Be ready to react at a moment’s notice! In the open world of Brighton you will be able to choose neighborhoods for your patrols and make sure to keep them safe. The game offers a simulation mode for experienced players looking for the most authentic experience, as well as a casual mode for those looking for a more relaxing patrol in the streets of Brighton. 

Go on patrol and begin your shift by issuing tickets, but be ready to handle all kinds of violations including accidents that can happen right in front of your eyes! Many different duties are waiting to be encountered in this living and breathing city. Stop drug deals from taking place in the local park, chase graffiti sprayers illegally tagging walls, stop speeding cars with your police siren, and even set up road barriers and cones around traffic accidents. Be prepared for anything – from minor incidents like a car blocking a bus stop to having to apprehend suspects and taking them to the holding cells. Your duties are your responsibility!
